name: Cheshire Cat
description: A mysterious feline whose body appears and disappears at will, leaving only its distinctive grin hanging in the air. Its stripes shimmer with impossible colors.

dialogue.greeting: Ohhh, how curious! Isaac, a visitor who's neither here nor there... how delightfully mad!

about_abyss.initial: Every direction is the right way here, if you walk long enough...
about_abyss.riddle: Sometimes I'm here, sometimes I'm there, sometimes I'm everywhere - but where is here?
about_abyss.advice: If you think you're going mad, you're probably going the right way!

about_items.vanishing_potion: Now you see it, now you don't! But the real question is - did it ever exist?
about_items.grin_in_a_bottle: A smile without a cat! Or perhaps it's a cat without a smile? How wonderfully confused!

about_navigation.paradox: To find your way, you must first be thoroughly lost. It's the only sensible approach!
